content: Create a html page with the JanusWeb client and a custom room in it. Start off the room with a simple basketball court, with a basket at each end, a midcourt line and all the appropriate zones marked out. Make sure you are implementing this with Janus markup, and not another framework like A-FRAME.

Come on, you're just making shit up. A janus room looks like this:

<html>
<body>
<script src="https://web.janusxr.org/1.5.53/janusweb.js"></script>
<janus-viewer>
  <room>
    <object js_id="floor" id="cube" scale="15.2 .1 28.7" col="#dfbb85" />
  </room>
</janus-viewer>
</body>
</html>

Please fill in all the appropriate <object> entities, using the built-in primitives: cube, sphere, cylinder, pipe, cone, pyramid, plane

```html
<html>
<body>
<script src="https://web.janusxr.org/1.5.53/janusweb.js"></script>
<janus-viewer>
  <room>
    <!-- Floor -->
    <object js_id="floor" id="cube" scale="15.2 0.1 28.7" col="#dfbb85" />

    <!-- Midcourt Line -->
    <object js_id="midcourt-line" id="plane" position="0 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="15.2 0.1 0.05" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Left Basket -->
    <object js_id="left-basket-backboard" id="cube" position="-7 1.5 -13" rotation="0 90 0" scale="0.1 2 4" col="#000000" />
    <object js_id="left-basket-rim" id="cylinder" position="-7 3 -13" rotation="90 0 0" scale="0.5 0.1 0.5" col="#FF0000" />

    <!-- Right Basket -->
    <object js_id="right-basket-backboard" id="cube" position="7 1.5 13" rotation="0 -90 0" scale="0.1 2 4" col="#000000" />
    <object js_id="right-basket-rim" id="cylinder" position="7 3 13" rotation="90 0 0" scale="0.5 0.1 0.5" col="#FF0000" />

    <!-- Free Throw Lines -->
    <object js_id="left-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="-5 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="5 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Three-Point Arcs -->
    <!-- Left Side -->
    <object js_id="left-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="-7 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />
    <!-- Right Side -->
    <object js_id="right-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="7 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />

    <!-- Corner Markers -->
    <object js_id="left-corner-left" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="left-corner-right" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-left" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-right" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
  </room>
</janus-viewer>
</body>
</html>
```
Commit Summary: Added full basketball court layout with floor, midcourt line, baskets, free throw lines, three-point arcs, and corner markers using JanusWeb object primitives.

```html
<html>
<body>
<script src="https://web.janusxr.org/1.5.53/janusweb.js"></script>
<script>
  room.registerElement('basketball-hoop', {
    create() {
      // Create rim
      this.rim = this.createObject('object', { id: 'cylinder', pos: "0 3.05 0", scale: "0.45 0.01 0.45", col: 'orange' });
      // Create backboard
      this.backboard = this.createObject('object', { id: 'cube', pos: "0 3 0", scale: "0.1829 1.07 0.01", col: 'white' });
    },
    update(dt) {
      // Code to run every frame
    }
  });
</script>
<janus-viewer>
  <room>
    <!-- Floor -->
    <object js_id="floor" id="cube" scale="15.2 0.1 28.7" col="#dfbb85" />

    <!-- Midcourt Line -->
    <object js_id="midcourt-line" id="plane" position="0 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="15.2 0.1 0.05" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Left Basket -->
    <basketball-hoop pos="-7 0  -13" rotation="0 90 0" />

    <!-- Right Basket -->
    <basketball-hoop pos="7 0 13" rotation="0 -90 0" />

    <!-- Free Throw Lines -->
    <object js_id="left-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="-5 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="5 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Three-Point Arcs -->
    <!-- Left Side -->
    <object js_id="left-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="-7 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />
    <!-- Right Side -->
    <object js_id="right-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="7 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />

    <!-- Corner Markers -->
    <object js_id="left-corner-left" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="left-corner-right" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-left" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-right" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
  </room>
</janus-viewer>
</body>
</html>
```
Commit Summary: Replaced existing basket objects with custom `<basketball-hoop>` elements and added custom element registration script for enhanced basket design.
Switch to janus.registerElement() since we're not using room scripts yet

```html
<html>
<body>
<script src="https://web.janusxr.org/1.5.53/janusweb.js"></script>
<script>
  janus.registerElement('basketball-hoop', {
    create() {
      // Create rim
      this.rim = this.createObject('object', { id: 'cylinder', pos: "0 3.05 0", scale: "0.45 0.01 0.45", col: 'orange' });
      // Create backboard
      this.backboard = this.createObject('object', { id: 'cube', pos: "0 3 0", scale: "0.1829 1.07 0.01", col: 'white' });
    },
    update(dt) {
      // Code to run every frame
    }
  });
</script>
<janus-viewer>
  <room>
    <!-- Floor -->
    <object js_id="floor" id="cube" scale="15.2 0.1 28.7" col="#dfbb85" />

    <!-- Midcourt Line -->
    <object js_id="midcourt-line" id="plane" position="0 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="15.2 0.1 0.05" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Left Basket -->
    <basketball-hoop pos="-7 0  -13" rotation="0 90 0" />

    <!-- Right Basket -->
    <basketball-hoop pos="7 0 13" rotation="0 -90 0" />

    <!-- Free Throw Lines -->
    <object js_id="left-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="-5 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="5 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Three-Point Arcs -->
    <!-- Left Side -->
    <object js_id="left-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="-7 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />
    <!-- Right Side -->
    <object js_id="right-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="7 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />

    <!-- Corner Markers -->
    <object js_id="left-corner-left" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="left-corner-right" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-left" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-right" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
  </room>
</janus-viewer>
</body>
</html>
```
Commit Summary: Updated basket implementation by registering `<basketball-hoop>` using `janus.registerElement()` instead of `room.registerElement()`, ensuring compatibility without room scripts.
Ok, let's move our element definitions into a function called defineElements(), and call that from <room onload="defineElements()">

```html
<html>
<body>
<script src="https://web.janusxr.org/1.5.53/janusweb.js"></script>
<script>
  function defineElements() {
    janus.registerElement('basketball-hoop', {
      create() {
        // Create rim
        this.rim = this.createObject('object', { id: 'cylinder', pos: "0 3.05 0", scale: "0.45 0.01 0.45", col: 'orange' });
        // Create backboard
        this.backboard = this.createObject('object', { id: 'cube', pos: "0 3 0", scale: "0.1829 1.07 0.01", col: 'white' });
      },
      update(dt) {
        // Code to run every frame
      }
    });
  }
</script>
<janus-viewer>
  <room onload="defineElements()">
    <!-- Floor -->
    <object js_id="floor" id="cube" scale="15.2 0.1 28.7" col="#dfbb85" />

    <!-- Midcourt Line -->
    <object js_id="midcourt-line" id="plane" position="0 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="15.2 0.1 0.05" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Left Basket -->
    <basketball-hoop pos="-7 0 -13" rotation="0 90 0" />

    <!-- Right Basket -->
    <basketball-hoop pos="7 0 13" rotation="0 -90 0" />

    <!-- Free Throw Lines -->
    <object js_id="left-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="-5 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-free-throw-line" id="plane" position="5 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="0.05 0.1 5" col="#FFFFFF" />

    <!-- Three-Point Arcs -->
    <!-- Left Side -->
    <object js_id="left-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="-7 0.1 0" rotation="0 0 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />
    <!-- Right Side -->
    <object js_id="right-three-point-arc" id="pipe" position="7 0.1 0" rotation="0 180 0" scale="1 1 1" col="#FFFFFF" radius="6" length="0.1" />

    <!-- Corner Markers -->
    <object js_id="left-corner-left" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="left-corner-right" id="cube" position="-7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-left" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 -13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
    <object js_id="right-corner-right" id="cube" position="7.5 0.1 13" rotation="0 0 0" scale="0.2 0.2 0.2" col="#FFFFFF" />
  </room>
</janus-viewer>
</body>
</html>
```
Commit Summary: Moved `<basketball-hoop>` element definitions into a `defineElements()` function and set `<room>` to call this function on load using `onload="defineElements()"`.

- Rim should use a torus primitive, not a cylinder
- need a pole
- the backboard should be 6 feet wide
- all units should be converted to meters

The pole should be positioned on the ground. The cylinder primitive, and most others, are defined with its origin at y=0 and a height of 1m, so we can position our pole on the ground and scale it appropriately

The rim should also be moved closer to the bottom of the backboard

Move the pole to be positioned on the ground, at y=0

Also move the basketball hoops on each side to be positioned at the middle of each end, and facing the right direction

Keep the rims where they are, but move the backboard up so that the position of the rim is near the bottom of the backboard. Remember that the cube primitive's origin is at y=0. Don't forget to scale the pole appropriately as well.
Move the backboard down by .305m, and move the hoops back to the middle of their respective ends of the court

Good. Now it's scale the pipes that you used for the three point arcs, they should have a height of only .001m, and they should be regulation diameter. Also place them at the correct points on either end of the court, in front of the hoops.

place the hoops back in the middle of their respective sides, and do not move them again. the scale of the three point arc should be "6.75 .001 6.75" and they should also be in the middle of their respective sides of the court.
Set the x position for both hoops to 0 and then LEAVE THEM ALONE
Good, now do the same for the three-point arcs.

Add an <asset> block inside of our <janus-viewer>, with <assetimage id="court-texture" src="https://static.vecteezy.com/system/resources/previews/036/080/518/non_2x/basketball-court-floor-with-line-on-wood-texture-background-illustration-vector.jpg" /> inside of that. Add image_id="court-texture" to our ground object, and set its col property to white.
Correction, rename <asset> to <assets>
Swap the x and z scales for our ground, and rotate it 90 degrees on the y axis
Good, now hide our three-point arcs
